Title: 40 m

CHAPTER 5 MAPWORK  129
Chapter
5
Method for calculating vertical 
exaggeration
Follow these steps:
Step 1:  Change the vertical scale from a word scale to a number 
scale. The vertical scale will be given to you in the question,  
e.g. 1 cm = 40 m. 
 
You must have the same units on both sides of the vertical scale 
in order to write it as a number scale. We need to convert
